summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3645, for the improvement of the alley in block 7, Hillman City Division No. 1, being the alley west of Rainier Avenue between Orcas Street and Findlay Street; by paving and grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44996, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
